members.name: Notorious
members.description:
I estabilished kOF back in 2017. We were just few players with a clan tag infront of our names.
kOF's first name was Kings of Fortnite, since we were that good to win any game we wanted back in the day, but a year ago we changed it to Knockout Force, feel like it was more professional that way.
I work in a different city from my hometown so mostly I can't play like I've done in the past, but often I enjoy playing CS:GO, Dota 2, used to play Black Ops IV a lot, and so on.
I was a big Rust fan, still am, but got no time to play it actively.
My job is producing, directing, and editing videos, and I do marketing on the side as well. 23 years of age.

socials.name: Snipernikola
socials.description:

members.name: IwAn
members.description:
Hello my name is Ivan, but I'm known as IwAn. I like playing games on a more competitive style by dedicating some extra time on mastering the game I'm currently playing. I usually play CSGO/Valorant, but back in the days i used to play GTA San Andreas and League of Legends too.
I am one of the Founders of the community we are building and real life friend with Notorious KING. The reason we are dedicating so much time and effort is because we all have the same passion for gaming. We love working on new things which would help our community grow further.
I hope you will enjoy what we build over the next years, because we are just getting started.

socials.name: IwAn
socials.description: I upload montages on trending games and games that I enjoy playing.

socials.name: IwAn
socials.description:
I livestream here every few weeks, playing games such as:
  • CS:GO
  • Valorant

members.name: Readie
members.description:
I enjoy playing the VR game Beat Saber a lot, I have put a lot of time into the game and I've become very skilled at it, I have taken part in the British summer/autumn tournaments as well as the Beat Saber League tournament.
I also play Rainbow Six Siege and I am starting to get back into Fortnite.
If you would like to message, chat and play with me my Discord ID is kOF.Readie#6594.
My rank does represent my skill.

socials.name: kOF.Readie
socials.description: I upload my best clips from streams to my YouTube and full videos of me playing other games that are interesting and fun to play, such as Rainbow Six Siege, GTAV and Fortnite.

socials.name: kOF.Readie
socials.description: I stream once every four or five days on my twitch, join me here if you want to watch me play Beat Saber and other games with the kOF group.

socials.name: kOF.Readie
socials.description: This is where I upload short clips from my streams that don't make it to my videos, short previews of my most recent YT videos, announcements and some of my non-kOF related pictures and videos.

members.name: Fluidity
members.description:
Hi, I'm 19. I like to play Fortnite as I find it interesting and unique.
I play for about 3 hours a day then some Csgo or Valorant afterwards I am a relatively serious gamer. But I also like to have fun while playing games I am more of a streamer than a video maker.
I started playing Fortnite back in 2017 and where I also met Notorious King and joined kOF It's a great clan and a great community loved every second of it we all started from strangers to becoming friends.
We always have a laugh no matter which game we play. I love to support the clan in any way that I can.
